meanings.definition: Not involving financial assets or investments.
meanings.sent1: The small business focused on noncapital projects to grow.
meanings.sent2: She preferred noncapital ventures to minimize risks.
meanings.sent3: The noncapital approach to business made everyone raise their eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Her noncapital strategy was like a breath of fresh air in the corporate world.
meanings.sent5: The team's success was attributed to their innovative noncapital methods.

meanings.definition: Not being the capital city of a country.
meanings.sent1: Tokyo is a noncapital city in Japan.
meanings.sent2: The noncapital towns often have a more relaxed atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: Living in a noncapital area has its own charm and uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The noncapital region was a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Exploring noncapital cities allows you to experience authentic local culture.

meanings.sent1: The email was written in noncapital letters.
meanings.sent2: He always types in noncapital text to save time.
meanings.sent3: The noncapital font made the document look informal.
